channel.title: Site on Michael Healy
channel.description: Recent content in Site on Michael Healy

item.title: Organizing and Thinking: Themes and Goals
item.description: So I’ve been thinking about how to organize and work through all of this. Both in terms of templating, as well as in terms of theming and organization. I currently have the personal stuff offset in its own subfolder, which I would either like to figure out how to place into its own subdomain, or something. I will need to figure out how to do that. There are things that I like with this Academic theme, especially in terms of it “looking” like a CV.

item.title: Open Site Initiative
item.description: After a presentation and conversation with Alex Gil, I’ve chosen, as a summer project, to re-do my personal website, for a few reasons: To better know the technologies I use. To better, and more openly, represent my work. To have more control over my making. I would like to know where the things I’m doing are going. To get off of a self-hosted Wordpress site. These is a big project for the summer, but luckily, I think it is working out.
